title: Ep163 Games Gone Wrong
description: This week, the gals choose their players and deal out some wild stories of games that got a little too serious. Topics include a bunch of "bothered" citizens, some roleplaying with tragic consequences, and a friendship turned very sour over a game of dice. Pop open a fresh bottle of  Endgame Chardonnay, reshuffle the deck, and tune in for Games Gone Wrong. For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
itunes:summary:
This week, the gals choose their players and deal out some wild stories of games that got a little too serious. Topics include a bunch of "bothered" citizens, some roleplaying with tragic consequences, and a friendship turned very sour over a game of dice. Pop open a fresh bottle of Winc's Endgame Chardonnay, reshuffle the deck, and tune in for Games Gone Wrong.
